title: Ticket #1210: Don't delegate a limited proxy as a full one
description: When DELEGATE_FULL_JOB_GSI_CREDENTIALS is set to True, Condor always tries to delegate a full proxy. This causes problems when the original proxy is limited. The GRAM2 gatekeeper rejects job submissions when this happens.
remarks:
